body: At the moment on avicus I have realised that I am being beaten a lot more than I used to. I'm not sure why this is but I would like it if people could post below advice to help me to improve my pvp. Thanks :) Joe
body_tagged: At the moment on avicus I have realised that I am being beaten a lot more than I used to. I'm not sure why this is but I would like it if people could post below advice to help me to improve my pvp. Thanks :) Joe
title: Help meh pvps.

replies.body: Play smart, dont engage 2 vs 1 unless you know you are going to win, always eat apples, always craft armor, try hitting your target at least once with the bow before attacking with the sword...
replies.body_tagged: Play smart, dont engage 2 vs 1 unless you know you are going to win, always eat apples, always craft armor, try hitting your target at least once with the bow before attacking with the sword...

replies.body: My secrets will never be revealed, hehehe
replies.body_tagged: My secrets will never be revealed, hehehe

replies.body: I have nothing to add because outside of walls I die every 2-3 sec so I feel your pain... But.. on walls, that's different...On walls I die every 4-5 sec so sorry, but I cant tell my walls massive super secret, secrets:))
